item.title: 0858 GM
item.description: score:858 Chances: General Motors plans to boost employment next year despite concerns over the shift to electric vehicles, which could signal positive growth for the company. The expectation of offering unionized workers higher wages might indicate a positive outlook for General Motors’ financial performance and workforce morale.
